code: @Test public void testSendingMessageGetsDelayed() throws Exception {     MockEndpoint mock = getMockEndpoint("mock:result").     mock.expectedBodiesReceived("Short delay").     template.sendBody("seda:a", "Long delay").     template.sendBody("seda:b", "Short delay").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }

protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() {     return new RouteBuilder() {          public void configure() {             from("seda:a").delay(500).to("mock:result").             from("seda:b").delay(1).to("mock:result").         }     }. }
